item.description:
A great steak...there is nothing better...at Texas Roadhouse...

It starts with great food: Hand-Cut Steaks, Fall-Off-The-Bone Ribs, Made-From-Scratch Sides, and Fresh-Baked Bread. Everything they do goes into making their hearty meals stand out. They handcraft almost everything that is served...larger portions so you get more flavors and more food for your dollar. And if you want an Ice Cold Beer or Legendary Margarita to wash it all down — well, they have those, too.

Come and check out these nuts!!!
item.how_to_find_us: Look, or ask, for Terri...Cell is 203-808-5829

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: We're Goin' On A Road Trip...To Texas Roadhouse!!!
